00071 template<typename T> std::string join(std::vector<T> toks, std::string with)
00072 {
00073     int len = (int)toks.size();
00074     std::ostringstream oss;
00075     int i = 0;
00076     for (; i < len - 1; i++)
00077     {
00078         oss << str::toString<T>(toks[i]) << with;
00079     }
00080     oss << str::toString(toks[i]);
00081     return oss.str();
00082 }
